cafes.name: Obscure Coffee Roasters
cafes.snippet: We would love for this to be a space for community that is open to everyone, no matter how involved you are with coffee or how knowledgeable you are about it.
cafes.title: Obscure Coffee Roasters Shines a Light on Puerto Rican Coffee in Brooklyn

cafes.name: HB Gold Bar
cafes.snippet: Our vision for the Gold Bar was to blend modern luxury with grounded intention.
cafes.title: Experimental Hogg Batch Coffee Shines in St. Pete at the HB Gold Bar

cafes.name: WatchHouse Coffee
cafes.address: 405 Lexington Ave., New York City, New York
cafes.snippet: What we're doing at WatchHouse is bringing that European, design-led sensibility to the table, that sense of real consideration.
cafes.title: New York's Iconic Chrysler Building Now Houses a WatchHouse

cafes.name: La Venta Café
cafes.snippet: La Venta Café completes the farm-to-cup connection from Colombia to Dubuque, bringing authentic Colombian coffee culture to Iowa.
cafes.title: La Venta Café Completes Farm-To-Cup Connection from Colombia to Dubuque

cafes.name: Slow Haste Coffee
cafes.snippet: Slow Haste Coffee is off to a fast start with a laidback Portland bar, embodying the city's unique coffee culture.
cafes.title: Slow Haste Coffee Off to Fast Start with Laidback Portland Bar

cafes.name: Per'La Coffee
cafes.snippet: Turkish hospitality meets specialty coffee at Per'La Coffee Bar, bringing authentic Turkish coffee culture to Los Angeles.
cafes.title: Per'La Coffee Brings Turkish Hospitality to Los Angeles

cafes.name: Community Blend
cafes.snippet: Community Blend opens in Minneapolis with a mission to create inclusive spaces and support local artists through coffee.
cafes.title: Community Blend Opens in Minneapolis with Inclusive Mission

cafes.name: Blossom Coffee Roasters
cafes.snippet: Blossom Coffee Roasters brings precision brewing and floral-forward coffees to San Francisco's Haight-Ashbury neighborhood.
cafes.title: Blossom Coffee Roasters Opens in San Francisco's Haight-Ashbury

cafes.name: Tenfold Coffee
cafes.snippet: Tenfold Coffee Company opens its third location in San Diego, continuing its commitment to direct trade and sustainability.
cafes.title: Tenfold Coffee Expands in San Diego

cafes.name: Copper Horse Coffee
cafes.snippet: Birmingham welcomes Copper Horse Coffee, featuring a custom-built Probat roaster and mid-century modern design.
cafes.title: Copper Horse Coffee Opens Birmingham Roastery

cafes.name: Ritual Coffee Roasters
cafes.snippet: San Francisco's Ritual Coffee Roasters expands to Denver, bringing its signature approach to coffee sourcing and roasting.
cafes.title: Ritual Coffee Roasters Expands to Denver

cafes.name: Broadsheet Coffee Roasters
cafes.snippet: Broadsheet Coffee Roasters opens in Boston's Financial District, offering single-origin coffees and seasonal blends.
cafes.title: Broadsheet Coffee Roasters Opens in Boston Financial District

cafes.name: Counterpart Coffee
cafes.address: 503 Amsterdam Ave., New York City, New York
cafes.snippet: Japanese-inspired Counterpart Coffee brings meticulous brewing techniques and minimalist design to the Upper West Side.
cafes.title: Counterpart Coffee Brings Japanese Style to NYC

cafes.name: Roseline Coffee
cafes.snippet: Roseline Coffee debuts in Portland's Northwest District with a focus on natural process coffees and botanical pairings.
cafes.title: Roseline Coffee Debuts in Portland with Botanical Focus

cafes.name: Alma Coffee
cafes.snippet: Farm-to-cup pioneer Alma Coffee opens its first cafe in Seattle, featuring coffees from their own farm in Honduras.
cafes.title: Alma Coffee Opens First Seattle Cafe
